items.title: Chart of the Day: Weak volumes remain a bugbear for pharma companies in India
items.description: Volumes contributed just 0.8 percentage points to Indian pharmaceutical market growth in 12 months to September 2024

items.title: Bharti Airtel's Sunil Mittal joins Ambani to pitch for satellite firms buying spectrum
items.description: Speaking at the India Mobile Conference, Mittal, who heads India's second largest telecom firm Bharti Airtel, said existing telecom companies will take satellite services into the remotest parts
